translation.en: [narrator] Once upon a time, there was a baker from Chicago.
translation.fr:
Il était une fois
une pâtissière de Chicago.

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
[narrator] That's me, Stacy,
who looks just like Margaret, the duchess of Montenaro.
translation.fr:
qui ressemble trait pour trait à Margaret,
la duchesse du Montenaro.

translation.en: Stacy, me again, married the handsome Prince Edward at Christmas,
translation.fr:
Stacy, encore moi, a épousé
le beau prince Edward à Noël

translation.en: while Margaret married my adorable best friend Kevin
translation.fr:
et Margaret a épousé
mon adorable meilleur ami Kevin

translation.en: right before she was crowned queen of Montenaro,
translation.fr:
juste avant d'être couronnée
reine du Montenaro,

translation.en: which almost didn't happen,
translation.fr: ce qui a failli ne pas arriver,

translation.en: because her cousin Fiona, who looks like both of us
translation.fr:
à cause de sa cousine Fiona,
qui nous ressemble aussi

translation.en: and is so over-the-top…
Maggie Moo!
[Stacy] …impersonated her in an attempt to steal the throne.
translation.fr:
… et qui s'est fait passer pour elle
pour tenter de lui voler le trône.

translation.en: Luckily, Fiona was caught and sentenced to many years of community service.
translation.fr:
Fiona a été arrêtée et condamnée
à des années de travaux d'intérêt général.

translation.en: I thought she should go to jail, but Margaret says she's family.
translation.fr:
Elle aurait dû aller en prison, mais Margaret dit
qu'elle est de la famille.

translation.en: [chuckles] Could Christmas get any more eventful?
translation.fr:
Noël pourrait-il être
encore plus mouvementé ?

translation.en: -Well, maybe. -[sirens wail]
Because this year, I'm cochairing
an international Christmas festival with Margaret,
translation.fr:
un festival international de Noël
avec Margaret,

translation.en: who's just about my best friend in the world.
And to commemorate the occasion,
the Vatican has loaned us the Star of Peace,
translation.fr:
le Vatican nous a prêté
l'Étoile de la Paix,

translation.en: a priceless relic that once belonged to Saint Nicholas himself.
translation.fr:
une relique inestimable qui a appartenu
à saint Nicolas lui-même.

translation.en: The Star will be kept under guard until it goes on top of a ginormous tree
translation.fr:
L'Étoile sera sous haute garde
avant d'être installée sur un énorme sapin

translation.en: at our tree-lighting ceremony on Christmas Eve.
translation.fr:
lors de la cérémonie d'illumination
à la veille de Noël.

translation.en: Oh, and that's Cardinal Amoah, the special emissary from the Vatican.
translation.fr:
Et voici le cardinal Amoah,
l'émissaire spécial du Vatican.

translation.en: Oh, this is so huge!
Can you believe this?
It's incredible.
I feel like we're making history.
translation.fr:
J'ai l'impression
qu'on entre dans l'histoire.

translation.en: Because you are making history.
Your Royal Majesty, Your Highness,
I present to you the Star of Peace.
translation.fr: je vous présente l'Étoile de la Paix.

translation.en: No one's getting paid a dime. It all goes to charity.
translation.fr:
Personne ne sera payé.
C'est pour une œuvre caritative.

translation.en: Yes, we had a cancellation,
so there's one final audition to fill the spot in the program.
translation.fr:
Il reste une dernière audition
pour occuper cette place.

translation.en: [Kevin] Okay. Bye.
Stacy and I are handling the details ourselves, so we'll be there.
translation.fr:
Stacy et moi nous occupons des détails.
Nous serons présentes.

translation.en: All right, thank you for checking. Bye.
[exhales] That's the last call I'm taking tonight. Me too.
translation.fr:
- C'est mon dernier appel de la soirée.
- Moi aussi.

translation.en: Oh, except for this one. Hey, Liv!
-Merry Christmas! -Merry Christmas.
Mm, we miss you, darling. How were exams?
translation.fr: Tu nous manques. Les examens, ça a été ?

translation.en: [Olivia] A major pain.
I love the ballet academy, don't get me wrong,
translation.fr:
J'adore l'école de danse,
ne vous méprenez pas,

translation.en: but they make you work really hard on the school part.
translation.fr:
mais ils sont à cheval
sur les résultats scolaires.

translation.en: Oh, it's nothing you can't handle.
Are you on your way to the airport?
That's why I called. JFK's closed because of the weather.
translation.fr:
C'est pour ça que j'appelle.
JFK est fermé à cause de la météo.

translation.en: The chaperone says we might leave from Bradley.
translation.fr: Il se pourrait qu'on parte de Bradley.

translation.en: Oh. Well, keep us posted.
I love you.
I love you more.
I'll sleep better once I know she's here.
translation.fr: Je dormirai mieux quand elle sera là.

translation.en: Yeah. You and me both.
Come here.
[Edward] Very good, Your Majesty.
Margaret and I love working together. Yeah, I'm sure we'll do it again.
translation.fr:
Margaret et moi
aimons travailler ensemble. Oui, nous le referons.

translation.en: It's just right now we kinda have our hands full.
translation.fr: Mais, là, nous sommes très occupées.

translation.en: We would love to see the corgis as well.
translation.fr: On aimerait voir les Corgis aussi.

translation.en: -Absolutely. You can quote me. -Yes. And a very Merry Christmas to you.
translation.fr:
- Vous pouvez me citer.
- Joyeux Noël à vous.

translation.en: -Thank you so much. Bye. -[Edward] Cheers.
Well, that makes 11 ambassadors,
nine prime ministers, seven kings, four queens,
translation.fr:
neuf premiers ministres,
sept rois, quatre reines,

translation.en: an entire delegation from Penglia--
And a partridge in a pear tree?
translation.fr: Et une perdrix dans un poirier ?

translation.en: -[sighs] Something like that. -[Stacy laughs]
I'm so glad I have you to help me with all this crazy last-minute stuff.
translation.fr:
Je suis ravie que tu m'aides
avec cette folie de dernière minute.

translation.en: We make a great team, don't we? Just like your dear old Chicago Red Sox.
translation.fr:
On forme une super équipe.
Comme tes chers Red Sox de Chicago.

translation.en: It's White Sox.
Yes, them as well. All the socks.
translation.fr: Oui, eux aussi. Une grande famille.

translation.en: [choir] ♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
translation.fr: Nous vous souhaitons un joyeux Noël

translation.en: ♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
translation.fr: Nous vous souhaitons un joyeux Noël Nous vous souhaitons un joyeux Noël

translation.en: ♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
translation.fr: Nous vous souhaitons un joyeux Noël

translation.en: ♪ And a Happy New Year ♪
-Oh, bravo! -Fabulous.
-Thank you very much. -This way please, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.fr:
- Merci.
- Par ici, mesdames et messieurs.

translation.en: Maybe we put them after the yodeler?
translation.fr: On les met après la chanteuse tyrolienne ?

translation.en: Do we really need a yodeler?
Well, we don't want to offend the Swiss ambassador.
translation.fr:
On ne veut pas
offenser l'ambassadeur suisse.

translation.en: We don't want to offend anyone.
[clicks tongue] Yeah.
I'm terribly sorry to interrupt, Your Majesty, but we have,
translation.fr:
Désolée de vous interrompre,
Votre Majesté, nous avons

translation.en: well, a bit of a situation.
This is Inspector Moretti, superintendent of police.
translation.fr:
Voici le lieutenant Moretti,
directrice de la police.

translation.en: The police? Well, that sounds serious.
translation.fr: La police ? Ça a l'air sérieux.

translation.en: I'm afraid it is, Your Majesty.
translation.fr: J'en ai bien peur, Votre Majesté.

translation.en: [Stacy] The Star of Peace is gone.
translation.fr: L'Étoile de la Paix a disparu.

translation.en: [exhales] This can't be happening.
Isn't the museum vault under guard around the clock?
translation.fr:
Ce coffre-fort
n'est pas surveillé jour et nuit ?

translation.en: The guards were drugged.
We found traces of chloromethazine in the ventilation system
translation.fr:
Il y a de la chloro-méthazine
dans le système de ventilation

translation.en: that services the security office.
Surely there's surveillance footage.
translation.fr: Il y a des images de surveillance.

translation.en: The thieves wiped the hard drives clean.
translation.fr: Les voleurs ont effacé les disques durs.

translation.en: Whoever did this came prepared.
We've notified Interpol, but with no forensic evidence,
translation.fr:
On a prévenu Interpol,
mais sans preuve scientifique,

translation.en: we've very little to go on.
Just please promise us you'll get it back in time for the ceremony.
translation.fr:
Promettez-nous juste de la récupérer
à temps pour la cérémonie.

translation.en: I'm afraid that would be a piecrust promise.
translation.fr: Ce serait une promesse en pâte à tarte.

translation.en: Easily made, easily broken.
translation.fr: Facile à faire, facile à briser.

translation.en: Oh dear!
We'd like to keep the investigation confidential
until we know more.
Well, shall we notify the cardinal?
Since it's possible the breach came from within Vatican security,
translation.fr:
Puisqu'il est possible que la faille
vienne de la sécurité du Vatican,

translation.en: Interpol has asked us to hold off until we rule them out.
translation.fr:
nous ne devons rien dire
avant de les avoir innocentés.

translation.en: Just know we're doing everything we can.
translation.fr: Sachez que nous faisons notre possible.

translation.en: Well, thank you, Inspector.
[sighs] The relic of Saint Nicholas.
I mean, this is an international scandal of epic proportions.
translation.fr:
C'est un scandale international
aux proportions énormes.

translation.en: [Kevin] Let's just try to stay calm, okay?
Yes, of course. [clears throat] Keep calm.
-I sympathize with you completely. -[sighs] Thank you.
translation.fr:
- Je compatis totalement avec toi.
- Merci.

translation.en: But when the crown jewels of Belgravia were stolen,
translation.fr:
Quand les joyaux de Belgravia
ont été volés,

translation.en: oh, my grandfather, the king, was nearly deposed.
translation.fr:
mon grand-père, le roi,
a failli être destitué.

translation.en: -[sighs] -Not helping.
But the jewels were eventually recovered.
translation.fr: Mais les bijoux ont été retrouvés.

translation.en: -Well, bits and pieces. -Ah.
A ruby here, a sapphire there, a diamond, you know.
translation.fr:
Un rubis par-ci,
un saphir par-là, un diamant.

translation.en: Dude. Come on.
There must be something we can do.
translation.fr: On doit pouvoir faire quelque chose.

translation.en: -[exhales] -The police are handling it.
They have no clues and no leads.
translation.fr: Ils n'ont ni indice ni piste.

translation.en: Wait. If the police don't have any leads,
translation.fr: Attendez. Si la police n'a pas de piste,

translation.en: then it's up to us to come up with something they haven't thought of.
translation.fr:
à nous de trouver quelque chose
auquel ils n'ont pas pensé.

translation.en: Like what?
Well, what we need is someone with information that the police don't have.
translation.fr:
Il nous faut quelqu'un qui ait
des informations que la police n'a pas,

translation.en: Someone with connections to the black market,
translation.fr: qui a des liens avec le marché noir

translation.en: and it wouldn't hurt if they were just a little bit crooked.
translation.fr:
et qui n'a pas peur
de faire des choses illégales.

translation.en: A little crooked?
Yes, indeed.
We need a person who actually thinks like a criminal,
translation.fr:
On a besoin d'une personne
qui pense comme un criminel,

translation.en: who has a history of never considering consequences,
translation.fr: qui n'a jamais pensé aux conséquences

translation.en: and has absolutely no fear of breaking the rules.
translation.fr:
et qui n'a pas peur
d'enfreindre les règles.

translation.en: -If only we knew someone like that. -[both] Fiona.
translation.fr:
Une idée en tête ? - Fiona.
- Fiona.

translation.en: If anyone knows the unseemly side of things, it's my cousin.
translation.fr:
Si quelqu'un connaît le côté obscur,
c'est ma cousine.

translation.en: [scoffs] I should know.
I'm sorry. Let me get this straight.
You want to employ the woman who, with the help of her cohorts,
translation.fr:
vous voulez engager la femme qui,
à l'aide de ses acolytes,

translation.en: masqueraded as you in an attempt to take over the country?
translation.fr:
s'est fait passer pour toi
pour s'emparer du pays ?

translation.en: Didn't she go to jail?
Fiona's serving a sentence of community service
translation.fr:
Fiona purge une peine
de travaux d'intérêt général

translation.en: at St. Michael's Convent.
I was actually thinking of inviting her for Christmas before any of this happened.
translation.fr: Je pensais l'inviter à Noël avant tout ça.

translation.en: You were?
I've always felt sorry for her,
translation.fr: J'ai toujours eu de la peine pour elle.

translation.en: growing up in boarding schools with no one to look after her.
translation.fr:
Elle a grandi en pensionnat
sans personne pour s'occuper d'elle.

translation.en: I think this past year at the convent's done her some good.
translation.fr:
Cette année au couvent
a dû lui faire du bien.

translation.en: Not that much good.
Look, it's not like I trust Fiona,
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas confiance en Fiona,

translation.en: but I mean, St. Michael's is less than an hour away, and the police are stumped.
translation.fr:
mais St Michael est à une heure de route
et la police est dans une impasse.

translation.en: It would be unconscionable to sit here and do nothing.
translation.fr:
Ce serait déraisonnable
de rester ici sans rien faire.

translation.en: What have we got to lose?
You know, anything and everything that isn't nailed down, but… [sighs]
translation.fr:
À peu près
tout ce qui n'est pas cloué, mais…

translation.en: …I can't think of any other ideas, so…
Kev?
[sighs] I'll start nailing things down.
[nun] You missed a spot.
Where? [nun] The library.
You know, the place with the books.
[scoffs] It's time for my break.
[nun] Need I remind you, Fiona Pembroke,
that you still owe 1,242 hours -of community service? -[watch beeps]
translation.fr:
que vous devez encore 12 042 heures
de travaux d'intérêt général ?

translation.en: [nun] Be that as it may, Mother Superior wants to see you in her office.
translation.fr:
Quoi qu'il en soit, la Mère supérieure
veut vous voir dans son bureau.

translation.en: Now!
Savage.
The sisters and I are absolutely thrilled
translation.fr: Les sœurs et moi sommes ravies

translation.en: Ms. Pembroke will be spending Christmas with you.
translation.fr: que Mlle Pembroke passe Noël avec vous.

translation.en: She's the only family I have left.
translation.fr: Elle est la seule famille qui me reste.

translation.en: Well, and her mother, but I haven't seen my aunt in years.
translation.fr:
Avec sa mère, mais je n'ai pas vu ma tante
depuis des années.

translation.en: I do hope Fiona hasn't been too much trouble.
translation.fr:
J'espère
qu'elle n'a pas causé trop d'ennuis.

translation.en: We are all God's children, my dear. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
Nous sommes tous
des enfants de Dieu, ma chère.

translation.en: Maggie Moo!
What a scrumptious surprise.
Oh, you're looking well.
What brings you to my private little corner of purgatory?
translation.fr:
Qu'est-ce qui t'amène
dans mon petit coin de purgatoire ?

translation.en: I thought it might be pleasant for us to have the holidays together.
translation.fr:
J'ai pensé que ce serait agréable
pour nous de passer les fêtes ensemble.

translation.en: Oh. Will I be mopping or dusting?
[chuckles] You'll be our guest.
[Mother Superior] After, uh, prayerful consideration,
I've told Her Majesty I could allow a discrete bending of the rules,
translation.fr:
j'ai dit à Sa Majesté que je pourrais
discrètement contourner les règles

translation.en: seeing as it's Christmas.
As long as you promise to return by December 26th.
translation.fr:
Tant que vous promettez de revenir
avant le 26 décembre.

translation.en: There's a hearing of the disciplinary committee
translation.fr:
Il y a une audience
du comité disciplinaire

translation.en: for which you must be present.
translation.fr: à laquelle vous devez être présente.

translation.en: We absolutely promise to have her back in time, Mother Superior.
translation.fr:
Nous promettons de la ramener à temps,
Mère supérieure.

translation.en: You have my word.
[inhales] Well, in that case,
Ms. Pembroke is free to spend the holidays at the palace.
translation.fr:
Mlle Pembroke est libre
de passer les fêtes au palais.

translation.en: Sounds like a gas.
Thank you, Inspector.
Yeah, keep us posted.
Anything?
They thought they had a lead, but it didn't pan out.
translation.fr:
Ils pensaient avoir une piste.
Ça n'a rien donné.

translation.en: [exhales] We could certainly use some good news right about now.
translation.fr: On aurait besoin d'une bonne nouvelle.

translation.en: No worries, royal six-pack. Good news has arrived.
translation.fr:
Ne t'inquiète pas, beau gosse royal.
La bonne nouvelle est arrivée.

translation.en: Special delivery.
-Handle with care. -[Fiona] Hm.
[Stacy] Um, Reggie and Mindy? You gotta be kidding me.
Fiona agreed to help us, but she said she needed her squad.
translation.fr:
Fiona a accepté de nous aider,
mais elle a besoin de son équipe.

translation.en: -Weren't they in jail as well? -[scoffs]
translation.fr: Ils n'étaient pas en prison aussi ?

translation.en: They were, but I, uh, pulled a few strings. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Si, mais j'ai tiré quelques ficelles.

translation.en: Well, it's good to be queen.
How's my fave cuzzie-in-law?
translation.fr:
Comment va
mon cousin par alliance préféré ?

translation.en: Fine, I guess.
I hope you ain't still sore over our little mix-up last Christmas.
translation.fr:
J'espère que tu n'es plus fâchée
à cause de notre petite erreur de Noël.

translation.en: -Mix-up? -[Reggie] Yeah.
You kidnapped me!
Okay. Still sore.
Spicy.
Why don't I have Mrs. Donatelli show you your rooms?
translation.fr:
Madame Donatelli pourrait
vous montrer vos chambres.

translation.en: This way. Please.
Meow.
Right, yes, uh,
meow to you as well.
-No respect. -[mouths] No.
None. Cool.
Am I late for brekkie?
Only by an hour… or three.
No worries. I couldn't eat a thing.
translation.fr: Pas grave. Je n'avais pas faim.

translation.en: Hey!
But I do have news. I've been in touch with an associate
translation.fr:
Mais j'ai des nouvelles.
J'ai contacté un associé

translation.en: who should be able to help us find our missing treasure.
translation.fr:
qui pourrait nous aider
à retrouver notre trésor.

translation.en: [Margaret] Does this associate have a name?
I'd rather not say until he's on board, but trust me, he's the GOAT.
translation.fr:
Je préfère ne pas le dire tout de suite,
mais c'est une pointure.

translation.en: Sorry, he's… he's a goat?
"Greatest of all time," babe. It's like a sports thing.
translation.fr:
Une pointure dans son domaine.
Le meilleur.

translation.en: I knew that. I… I knew that.
[Mindy] I bet it's that count from Barcelona.
translation.fr: Je parie que c'est ce comte de Barcelone.

translation.en: [Reggie] Nah, he's a squirrelly one.
Never looks you square in the eye.
translation.fr: Il ne te regarde jamais dans les yeux.

translation.en: He's got a glass eye, idiot.
translation.fr: Il a un œil de verre, idiot.

translation.en: [inhales] I'll need to borrow a car,
and preferably a 'rari that matches my Manolos.
translation.fr:
de préférence une Ferrari
assortie à mes escarpins.

translation.en: Don't worry. Frank will be happy to drive you.
Don't you trust me, royal boo?
translation.fr: Tu ne me fais pas confiance ?

translation.en: [Stacy] Hell no.
And Bonnie and Clyde are staying right here
translation.fr: Et Bonnie et Clyde restent ici

translation.en: just to make sure you come back.
-[scoffs] -Here? What are we supposed to do all day?
translation.fr:
Ici ? Qu'allons-nous faire
de notre journée ?

translation.en: Perhaps you could start by, uh, returning the silver.
translation.fr:
Vous pourriez commencer
par rendre l'argenterie.

translation.en: Reggie!
What?
[sighs] Dear.
Right. Okay. Now look, I don't wish to be impertinent, Your Ladyship,
translation.fr:
Bien. Écoutez, je ne veux pas
être impertinent, mademoiselle,

translation.en: but if you're not out in 20 minutes,
translation.fr:
mais si vous n'êtes pas sortie
dans 20 minutes,

translation.en: I have strict orders to come in there and fetch.
translation.fr: j'ai l'ordre de venir vous chercher.

translation.en: Bossy.
Remember! Twenty minutes!
You haven't lost your touch.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas perdu de ton adresse.

translation.en: Some say.
You're looking well, Peter.
You too, Pemmie.
It's Pembroke.
You'll always be Pemmie to me.
translation.fr: Tu seras toujours Pemmie pour moi.

translation.en: So, how long has it been
since you walked out on me that spring night in Barbados?
translation.fr:
depuis que tu m'as quitté
une nuit à la Barbade ?

translation.en: Oh, please.
We were always better as friends. Everything else was a complication.
translation.fr:
On s'entend mieux en tant qu'amis.
Le reste, ça complique toujours tout.

translation.en: That's an interesting word for it.
I heard from Bianca the other day.
translation.fr: J'ai eu des nouvelles de Bianca.

translation.en: Mummy's always had a soft spot for you since we were in nappies.
translation.fr:
Maman a toujours eu un faible pour toi
depuis qu'on est petits.

translation.en: She says you won't return her calls.
translation.fr: Tu ne réponds pas à ses appels.

translation.en: I have nothing to say.
[Peter] Oh, come on, Pemmie. It's Christmas.
Give the old girl a break.
If I remember, you weren't speaking to your father.
translation.fr:
Si je me souviens bien,
tu ne parlais pas à ton père.

translation.en: No. I wasn't.
But I saw him last Christmas, two days before he passed.
translation.fr:
Mais je l'ai vu à Noël dernier,
deux jours avant sa mort.

translation.en: And I'm very glad I did.
Well, now that we've limped down memory lane, can we talk business?
translation.fr:
Maintenant qu'on a évoqué le passé,
on peut parler affaires ?

translation.en: The Star of Peace.
You want my help getting it back.
translation.fr: Tu veux que je t'aide à la récupérer.

translation.en: Question is, why is it so important to you?
translation.fr: Pourquoi est-ce si important pour toi ?

translation.en: [Fiona] Well, it's important to my cuzzie.
I treated her… [sighs] …unkindly,
translation.fr:
Je l'ai… malmenée,
alors j'espère pouvoir me racheter.

translation.en: so I thought I'd make it up to her.
translation.fr:
malmenée,
alors j'espère pouvoir me racheter.

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes, I heard about your little escapade.
translation.fr: J'ai entendu parler de tes frasques.

translation.en: So, will you help despite our colorful past?
translation.fr:
Alors, vas-tu nous aider
malgré notre passé houleux ?

translation.en: You know the answer to that.
No matter what, no matter where?
Let me show you what I've dug up. [chuckles softly]
translation.fr: Viens voir ce que j'ai trouvé.

translation.en: -Are you coming? -Mm.
Et voilà! The Interpol case file.
Interpol? I thought you left them.
translation.fr:
Interpol ? Je croyais
que tu avais démissionné.

translation.en: That doesn't mean I've forgotten how to get around their firewalls.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai pas oublié
comment contourner leurs pare-feux.

translation.en: -Oh. -According to this report, there are no suspects in the theft,
translation.fr:
D'après ce rapport,
il n'y a aucun suspect,

translation.en: but the interesting bit
is that chloromethazine was used to drug the guards.
Why on earth is that interesting?
Interpol is utterly convinced
that the black-market supply is limited to an Asian distributor.
translation.fr:
que l'offre sur le marché noir
se limite à un distributeur asiatique.

translation.en: And it is,
except for one disreputable pharmacist in Geneva,
translation.fr:
à part un pharmacien
peu recommandable à Genève,

translation.en: who runs an after-hours operation out of the back of his warehouse on Place du Port.
translation.fr:
qui fait des heures supplémentaires
à l'arrière de son entrepôt place du Port.

translation.en: [inhales] Now, lucky for us,
there are security cameras all along the riverbank.
translation.fr: il y a des caméras de surveillance.

translation.en: I searched through the last three days of footage and came up with this.
translation.fr:
J'ai visionné les trois derniers jours.
J'ai trouvé ça.

translation.en: That's Itai Krauss.
Do I know him?
Indirectly.
He works for an old friend of yours.
translation.fr: Il travaille pour un vieil ami.

translation.en: -[computer beeps] -Hunter Cunard,
the billionaire hotel tycoon.
Why would a hotel tycoon steal the Star of Peace?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi un magnat de l'hôtellerie
volerait l'Étoile de la Paix ?

translation.en: It's a little-known fact that Hunter's secret obsession
translation.fr:
Peu de gens savent
qu'il est obsédé par l'idée

translation.en: is collecting precious items that aren't for sale.
translation.fr:
de collectionner des objets précieux
qui ne sont pas à vendre.

translation.en: Paintings, antiquities, jewels. He loves an impossible challenge.
translation.fr:
Tableaux, antiquités, bijoux.
Il aime les défis impossibles.

translation.en: You've been an invaluable help, Mr. Maxwell.
translation.fr: Vous avez été d'une aide précieuse.

translation.en: I'm certain the police will be grateful for the information.
translation.fr:
Je suis sûre
que la police sera reconnaissante.

translation.en: Maggie, don't be silly. You can't go to the police.
translation.fr:
Ne sois pas bête.
Tu ne peux pas aller voir la police.

translation.en: Why not?
Hunter has friends everywhere.
One wrong word to the wrong person, and the Star disappears forever.
translation.fr:
Un mot à la mauvaise personne
et l'Étoile disparaît à jamais.

translation.en: [scoffs] So, what do we do?
The only thing you can do.
You steal it back.
translation.fr: Vous la volez à votre tour.

translation.en: How?
Every Christmas, Hunter hosts an exclusive soiree at his estate.
translation.fr:
Chaque Noël, Hunter organise
une soirée privée dans sa propriété.

translation.en: It happens to be this Saturday night.
translation.fr: Il s'avère que c'est samedi soir.

translation.en: [sighs] Well, I assume security will be tight as a drum.
translation.fr: J'imagine que la sécurité sera renforcée.

translation.en: -Oh. -[Peter] It will be, but there'll also be people coming and going,
translation.fr:
Oui, mais il y aura
aussi des va-et-vient :

translation.en: caterers, florists, guests, which affords us the perfect opportunity.
translation.fr:
traiteurs, fleuristes, invités,
ce qui nous donne l'occasion parfaite.

translation.en: All we have to do is make sure Hunter is occupied,
translation.fr:
Nous devons nous assurer
que Hunter est occupé

translation.en: and lucky for us, he used to be quite enamored of Fiona.
translation.fr:
et, heureusement pour nous,
il était fou amoureux de Fiona.

translation.en: Oh! So, uh, this bad boy had a thing for you, huh?
translation.fr: Ce mauvais garçon en pinçait pour toi ?

translation.en: Oh, we had a bit of a steamy. [chuckles] But he wasn't my type.
translation.fr:
C'était assez torride,
mais ce n'était pas mon genre.

translation.en: So, when was the last time you spoke to this Mr. Cunard?
translation.fr:
Quand lui as-tu parlé
pour la dernière fois ?

translation.en: [scoffs] A few years ago. We both moved on.
translation.fr:
Il y a quelques années.
On a tourné la page.

translation.en: If it's been years, how are you gonna get invited to the party?
translation.fr:
Si ça fait des années,
comment vas-tu être invitée ?

translation.en: Hunter walks his dog through the park behind the library
translation.fr:
Il promène son chien
dans le parc derrière la bibliothèque

translation.en: every morning at 8:00 a.m., rain or shine.
translation.fr:
tous les matins à 8 h,
peu importe le temps.

translation.en: Fiona will do the same.
I'm certain once they coincidentally run into each other,
translation.fr:
Je suis sûr qu'une fois
qu'ils se croiseront par pur hasard,

translation.en: she can charm an invitation out of him.
Where is she gonna get a dog?
Hm, I can pinch her a pooch.
Forgive me, but aren't you the Peter Maxwell who worked for Interpol
translation.fr:
N'êtes-vous pas le Peter Maxwell
qui travaillait pour Interpol

translation.en: and was, well, charged with a rather large-scale diamond theft?
translation.fr:
et qui a été accusé
d'un vol de diamants de grande envergure ?

translation.en: The charges were dismissed, but the incident tarnished my reputation,
translation.fr:
Les charges ont été abandonnées,
mais l'incident a terni ma réputation.

translation.en: so I resigned and started my own private security firm,
translation.fr:
J'ai démissionné et créé
ma propre société de sécurité,

translation.en: which has proven quite lucrative.
Mm-hmm. So what's your finder's fee?
-There is no fee. -Why not?
Let's just say… I have my reasons.
[exhales] This isn't a dog. It's bloody Big Foot.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un chien. C'est le yéti.

translation.en: Pugsley's a pussycat. You just don't know how to handle him.
translation.fr:
Pugsley est un amour.
Tu ne sais pas t'y prendre.

translation.en: [Fiona scoffs] I know how I'm going to handle you if I break a heel.
translation.fr:
Je sais ce que tu vas prendre,
si je casse un talon.

translation.en: If I can have your attention… [on comm] …Hunter's just arrived.
-[Fiona] Location? -[Peter] He's headed your way.
translation.fr:
- Où est-il ?
- Il se dirige vers toi.

translation.en: Oh, he's lush.
[Peter] You'll intersect his path in 100 yards.
Would you please get your nose out of that bush?
translation.fr: Peux-tu sortir ton nez de ce buisson ?

translation.en: [Mindy] He just passed the latte stand.
translation.fr: Il vient de passer le stand.

translation.en: Ugh, what seems to be your problem?
I don't have a problem.
Not you.
-No. No. -Pugsley!
Stop this at once! Naughty dog. Bad dog. Stop!
translation.fr:
Arrête tout de suite !
Vilain chien. Méchant chien. Arrête !

translation.en: Dog! [gasps] Oh no.
Wretched.
My nail!
-[chuckles] -[Fiona] I've broken a nail!
translation.fr: Je me suis cassé un ongle.

translation.en: -Where'd you get it from, a horse ranch? -Would you watch what you're saying?
translation.fr:
- Il vient d'un ranch de chevaux ?
- Fais attention à ce que tu dis.

translation.en: You couldn't have got us a toy poodle?
Oh, because poodles grow on trees.
translation.fr: Ça ne pousse pas sur les arbres.

translation.en: Did she say poodles grew on trees, genius?
translation.fr: Elle a dit ça, petit génie ?

translation.en: Oh, look, it's a poodle tree. [gasps] Let's pick us a white one, shall we?
translation.fr:
Regarde, c'est un arbre à caniches.
Choisissons-en un blanc, d'accord ?

translation.en: -Can we talk about plan B? -Thank God there's a plan B.
translation.fr:
- On peut parler du plan B ?
- Dieu merci, un plan B.

translation.en: Peter always has a plan B.
translation.fr: Il a toujours un plan B.

translation.en: [Peter] Hunter's newest boutique hotel
is unveiling its Christmas decorations tonight.
translation.fr: présente ses décorations de Noël ce soir.

translation.en: He's planning a walk-through at four.
translation.fr: Il prévoit de s'y rendre à 16 h.

translation.en: It might be a bit difficult to get his attention,
translation.fr:
Ça risque d'être difficile
de capter son attention,

translation.en: but I'm sure you'll be up to the challenge…
translation.fr: mais je suis sûr que tu en seras capable

translation.en: -[scoffs] -….once you freshen up a bit.
Excuse you.
Messy becomes you, Pemmie, but it's a bit overdone.
translation.fr:
La négligence te va bien,
mais c'est un peu trop.

translation.en: Here.
I hate to interrupt,
but if we're gonna get there by four, we better get on with it.
translation.fr:
mais pour y être à 16 h,
il faut se préparer.

translation.en: Yeah, just give me 20 minutes to moisturize.
You two aren't going anywhere.
-What? -What?
Do not ask me to explain why after what just happened.
translation.fr:
Ne me demandez pas d'explications
après ce qui vient d'arriver.

translation.en: -But I didn't do anything wrong! -Zzzt.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien fait de mal !

translation.en: [Mindy] Now she's mad at me!
translation.fr:
- Elle m'en veut !
- Ce n'est pas ma faute.

translation.en: -[Reggie] That's not my fault. -[Mindy] Of course it is.
translation.fr:
- Elle m'en veut !
- Ce n'est pas ma faute. - Bien sûr que si.
- Non.

translation.en: -[Reggie] No, it's not. -[Mindy] It is.
-[Reggie] No, it's not. -[Mindy] It is.
translation.fr:
- Si.
- Non, pas du tout. Si !

translation.en: -[woman 1] Hi! -[woman 2] Hi! It's you!
-Thank you for coming. -[woman 2] Thank you.
-[Peter on comm] Get ready. -[man] Yes, ma'am.
[woman 1] Come.
[Hunter] I guess it looks fine.
Just remember, finish by five, or you're fired.
translation.fr:
Rappelez-vous, finissez avant 17 h
ou vous êtes virée.

translation.en: [woman 3] Yes, Mr. Cunard.
He's on his way.
[on comm] Be ready.
Absolutely.
Let's make some merry, shall we?
-Welcome to Santa's workshop. -[Fiona] Thank you.
translation.fr:
- Bienvenue dans l'atelier du père Noël.
- Merci.

translation.en: -[Santa] I hope you've been a good girl. -[Fiona chuckles] Never.
translation.fr:
- Vous avez été sage cette année ?
- Jamais.

translation.en: Say mistletoe.
[both] Mistletoe!
[Fiona] Have you been naughty or nice?
translation.fr: Vous avez été méchante ou gentille ?

translation.en: Fiona Pembroke.
Hunter. [chuckles]
What on earth are you doing here?
I could ask you the same thing.
Well, age before beauty.
I own the place.
-You're joking. -Not at all.
Now it's your turn.
Well, the lounge here serves a candy cane martini that's to die for.
translation.fr:
Le bar sert un martini
au sucre d'orge à tomber par terre.

translation.en: Then what are we waiting for?
[Hunter] What about you? You been busy spending your inheritance?
translation.fr:
Et toi ?
Toujours occupée à dépenser ton héritage ?

translation.en: More or less. It's all such a bore.
translation.fr: Plus ou moins. C'est tellement ennuyeux.

translation.en: What ever happened to that dreary little rodent that you were seeing when we met?
translation.fr:
Qu'est-il arrivé à la vermine
que tu voyais quand on s'est rencontrés ?

translation.en: Peter something.
-Peter Maxwell. -[Fiona scoffs]
That wretched little man.
Oh, you were quite stuck on him as I recall.
translation.fr: Tu étais amoureuse de lui, non ?

translation.en: I don't get stuck on anyone.
translation.fr: Je ne suis amoureuse de personne.

translation.en: Oh, I'm well aware of that.
If I was a sentimental sort, I'd say you broke my heart.
translation.fr:
Si j'étais un sentimental,
je dirais que tu m'as brisé le cœur.

translation.en: Mm. We're quite the pair, aren't we?
-Cut from the same cloth. -[Fiona] Mm.
Which means we both know that you didn't just wander in here for the martinis.
translation.fr:
Donc on sait tous les deux
que tu n'es pas là pour les martinis.

translation.en: So why don't you tell me the real reason for this coincidental meeting?
translation.fr:
Si tu me disais la vraie raison
de cette rencontre fortuite ?

translation.en: All right.
It's true I inherited Daddy's fortune.
translation.fr:
Il est vrai
que j'ai hérité de la fortune de Papa.

translation.en: It's also true that there's very little of it left.
translation.fr: Et il est vrai qu'il en reste très peu.

translation.en: So you're here for a handout.
Oh, no. Not a handout. A proposition.
What kind of proposition?
Well, the Pembroke estate, it would make a darling boutique hotel.
translation.fr:
La propriété Pembroke
ferait un charmant hôtel de luxe.

translation.en: You're not serious about selling.
Dead serious.
But Pembroke's been in your family for generations.
translation.fr:
Elle appartient
à ta famille depuis toujours.

translation.en: If you're not interested… [scoffs]
Sit… down.
I didn't say I wasn't interested.
Let's talk about this after the New Year, shall we? I'm insanely busy until then.
translation.fr:
Parlons-en après le Nouvel An.
Je suis très occupée jusque-là.

translation.en: [Hunter] All right.
After New Year's.
-[tango music intensifies] -Ciao.
[Hunter] Fiona!
I'm hosting a little holiday party at my home in the country on Saturday.
translation.fr:
J'organise une petite fête chez moi,
à la campagne, samedi.

translation.en: Cocktails at six, dinner at eight, if your busy schedule will allow.
translation.fr:
Le cocktail est à 18 h, le dîner à 20 h,
si ton emploi du temps le permet.

translation.en: Will there be candy cane martinis?
translation.fr: Il y aura des martinis au sucre d'orge ?

translation.en: Anything your heart desires.
Mm. Delicious. See you Saturday.
Oh, and, uh, you owe me a tango.
translation.fr: Et… tu me dois un tango.

translation.en: [Frank] Good evening, Ms. Pembroke.
Well?
You took a risk, and it paid off.
translation.fr: Tu as pris un risque et ça a payé.

translation.en: Is that all you have to say?
translation.fr: C'est tout ce que tu as à dire ?

translation.en: If Hunter wasn't utterly besotted with you,
translation.fr: Si Hunter n'était pas aussi fou de toi,

translation.en: he'd have called your bluff, and we'd be up a creek right now.
translation.fr:
il aurait vu que tu bluffais
et on aurait eu des ennuis.

translation.en: You're jealous.
[scoffs] I'm not jealous.
Oh, you're completely jealous.
-Do you want me to be jealous? -[Fiona scoffs]
translation.fr: Tu veux que je sois jaloux ?

translation.en: Don't be ridiculous.
Because being jealous would mean there's something between us.
translation.fr:
Cela signifierait
qu'il y a quelque chose entre nous.

translation.en: -And there is nothing between us. -Absolutely nothing.
translation.fr:
- Il n'y a rien entre nous.
- Absolument rien.

translation.en: -Positively nothing. -Completely nothing.
translation.fr:
- Rien du tout.
- Rien de rien.

translation.en: ♪ Like this I'm gonna show you ♪
[sighs] It's Mummy again.
Just say hello.
That's all she wants.
[Fiona] But you said we would be together for Christmas.
translation.fr:
Tu disais
qu'on serait ensemble pour Noël.

translation.en: [Bianca] I know I did, darling, but something's come up.
translation.fr:
Je sais, chérie,
mais il y a eu un imprévu.

translation.en: You're gonna have so much fun here at Manderston.
translation.fr: Tu vas bien t'amuser à Manderston.

translation.en: Look, Peter's staying as well. [chuckles]
There. That's settled, then.
Don't go!
[Bianca] Oh, Fiona, darling. Fiona, chin up.
Mummy's got a plane to catch.
translation.fr: Maman a un avion à prendre.

translation.en: -I made this for you. -[Bianca] Oh.
Oh. Charming.
Ciao, bella. Kiss, kiss.
This is a 3D blueprint of Hunter Cunard's Montenaro estate.
translation.fr:
Voici un plan en 3D de la propriété
de Hunter Cunard à Montenaro.

translation.en: Hunter's private office, here, is located on a separate wing.
translation.fr:
Le bureau privé de Hunter, ici,
est situé dans une aile séparée.

translation.en: The adjoining gallery, here, is where he keeps his art collection.
translation.fr:
Il conserve sa collection d'art
dans la galerie attenante.

translation.en: The entry is operated by a keypad with a six-digit security code.
translation.fr:
L'entrée est commandée par un clavier
avec un code à six chiffres.

translation.en: And once you're inside the gallery?
translation.fr: Et une fois dans la galerie ?

translation.en: The display case is surrounded by a web of laser motion detectors.
translation.fr:
La vitrine est entourée
de détecteurs de mouvement laser.

translation.en: -We'll need to disarm them. -Dibs on the lasers!
translation.fr:
- Il faudra les désactiver.
- Prem's sur les lasers !

translation.en: I'm double-jointed. [chuckles]
It'll take a team of three to pull it off.
translation.fr: Il faudra trois personnes pour réussir.

translation.en: And then what?
This is an overlay of the internal camera system.
translation.fr:
Ceci est une reconstitution
du système de caméra interne.

translation.en: One of us taps into the circuitry, overrides the camera system
translation.fr:
L'un d'entre nous s'introduit
dans les circuits, force le système,

translation.en: while the other two break into the gallery and steal the Star of Peace.
translation.fr:
pendant que deux autres
entrent et volent l'Étoile de la Paix.

translation.en: This is going to be like breaking into Fort Knox.
translation.fr:
C'est comme entrer par effraction
à Fort Knox.

translation.en: [Peter] We have little time to practice.
translation.fr: On a peu de temps pour s'entraîner.

translation.en: Everything must be perfect, or we run the risk of getting caught.
translation.fr:
Tout doit être parfait,
sinon on risque de se faire prendre.

translation.en: And what happens if you do get caught?
translation.fr: Et si vous vous faites prendre ?

translation.en: Well, Hunter can't call the police
translation.fr: Hunter ne peut pas appeler la police

translation.en: to report the theft of something he's stolen.
translation.fr: pour le vol d'un objet qu'il a volé.

translation.en: In situations like this,
he has a history of making the problem disappear.
translation.fr:
il a l'habitude
de faire disparaître le problème.

translation.en: Forever.
We've forgotten the biggest problem of all.
translation.fr: On a oublié le plus gros problème.

translation.en: Which is?
I have nothing to wear.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien à me mettre.

translation.en: You know, you never told us what our cut is for this little caper.
translation.fr:
Tu ne nous as jamais dit
quelle serait notre part du butin.

translation.en: Well, the cut, Reggie, is to spend Christmas with Maggie at the palace.
translation.fr:
La part, Reggie, c'est de passer Noël
avec Maggie au palais.

translation.en: Truth is, we really do owe her a favor.
translation.fr:
En réalité,
on lui doit vraiment une faveur.

translation.en: Maybe, but that doesn't explain Peter Maxwell.
translation.fr:
Peut-être, mais ça n'explique pas
Peter Maxwell.

translation.en: -[Reggie] Hmm! -Unlike the two of you,
Peter is an expert at getting past security systems without getting caught.
translation.fr:
c'est un expert pour passer les systèmes
de sécurité sans se faire prendre.

translation.en: Oh, I bet he can get past your security systems, eh?
translation.fr:
Je parie qu'il peut passer
tes systèmes de sécurité.

translation.en: Excuse you.
Oh, admit it, Fif.
You're a smitten kitten.
There was a time, but it was long ago.
translation.fr:
Il fut un temps,
mais c'était il y a longtemps.

translation.en: Nah. Reggie's onto something.
There's a little bit of flirty dirty going on.
translation.fr: Il y a un peu de drague entre vous.

translation.en: A bit of do you, don't ya. Can't ya, won't ya.
translation.fr:
Suis-moi, je te fuis.
Fuis-moi, je te suis.

translation.en: -Get out. -Oh, come on, Fif!
You gotta give us more than that!
translation.fr: Tu dois nous en dire plus !

translation.en: Get out now.
[laughs] All right. Don't get your knickers in a twist.
translation.fr: D'accord. Ne te mets pas en colère.

translation.en: You miss your mum, don't you?
translation.fr: Ta mère te manque, pas vrai ?

translation.en: [hesitates] I don't think she loves me anymore.
translation.fr: Je crois qu'elle ne m'aime plus.

translation.en: Of course she does.
Then why would she leave me all alone at Christmas?
translation.fr:
Alors pourquoi
me laisserait-elle seule à Noël ?

translation.en: I'm here, and we'll always be friends.
translation.fr: Je suis là et on sera toujours amis.

translation.en: Come here.
See that up there?
No matter where you are,
all you have to do is look up at the North Star,
translation.fr: tu n'as qu'à regarder l'étoile polaire

translation.en: and you'll never be alone,
translation.fr: et tu ne seras jamais seule

translation.en: 'cause wherever I am, you know I'll be looking up at it too.
translation.fr:
car où que je sois,
tu sais que je la regarderai aussi.

translation.en: -Promise? -Swear.
No matter what?
No matter where.
-[Reggie] Can you just carry some-- -[Frank] I know, I've got funny knees.
translation.fr:
- Vous pouvez porter…
- Je sais, j'ai des genoux bizarres.

translation.en: I'm just saying.
If you just--
[all] Ready.
This is an approximation
of the motion sensor array in Hunter's gallery.
translation.fr:
des détecteurs de mouvement
de la galerie de Hunter.

translation.en: And here we go.
This is where it gets tricky.
Oh, I get it. You need a partner to boost you over that high beam.
translation.fr:
Je sais. Tu as besoin d'un partenaire
pour te faire passer ce rayon.

translation.en: [Peter] Precisely.
It's the only way of getting through to the control panel on the other side.
translation.fr:
C'est le seul moyen d'atteindre
le panneau de contrôle.

translation.en: Well, limber… [groans] …is my middle name.
Yeah.
Dear God.
Let's reset.
Let me have one more go, okay?
Watch and learn.
Done.
You're up, Reggie.
All right.
No.
"Meet me outside?"
Shall we?
Wait for it.
-A client lent it to me for the evening. -How very James Bond.
translation.fr:
- Un client me l'a prêté pour la soirée.
- C'est très James Bond.

translation.en: [chuckles] Come on, Pemmie. It'll be like old times.
translation.fr: Viens. Ce sera comme au bon vieux temps.

translation.en: [Kevin] What's going on?
Oh, Fiona and Peter. They're really quite adorable together.
translation.fr:
Fiona et Peter.
Ils sont si mignons ensemble.

translation.en: [Kevin] They better be heading up north.
translation.fr: Ils ont intérêt à aller au nord.

translation.en: [Margaret] Why's that?
Storm's moving in from the south. They closed the airport over an hour ago.
translation.fr:
Une tempête arrive du sud.
Ils ont fermé l'aéroport il y a une heure.

translation.en: Olivia.
She just texted. They've been rerouted to Brussels.
translation.fr:
Elle m'a écrit.
Ils sont redirigés vers Bruxelles.

translation.en: I thought I'd surprise her and pick her up myself.
translation.fr:
J'ai pensé lui faire une surprise
et aller la chercher.

translation.en: -When do you think you'll be back? -It's an eight-hour drive.
translation.fr:
- Tu reviens quand ?
- C'est à huit heures de route.

translation.en: If I leave first thing in the morning, I should be there by the time she lands.
translation.fr:
Si je pars demain matin,
je devrais y être à l'atterrissage.

translation.en: So I'll only be gone a day, day and a half tops.
translation.fr: Je ne m'absenterai qu'un jour et demi.

translation.en: It should be fine.
Are you sure you're gonna be okay?
translation.fr: Tu es sûre que ça va aller ?

translation.en: I mean with everything going on.
translation.fr: Avec tout ce qui se passe.

translation.en: I'll be in meetings all morning,
translation.fr: J'ai des réunions toute la matinée,

translation.en: and then there's tea with Cardinal Amoah, so you won't miss much.
translation.fr:
il y aura le thé avec le cardinal Amoah.
Tu ne manqueras pas grand-chose.

translation.en: -I'll miss you. -[chuckles] I miss you already.
translation.fr: Tu vas me manquer. Tu me manques déjà.

translation.en: Where are we going? The North Pole?
Almost. Hang on.
Go ahead. Take your best shot.
Looks like Santa's elves smoked a little too much mistletoe.
translation.fr:
On dirait que les lutins du Père Noël
ont fumé un peu trop de gui.

translation.en: [Peter] Oh, I've got an idea.
Please tell me it involves alcohol. Guess again.
translation.fr:
- Dis-moi que ça implique de l'alcool.
- Essaie encore.

translation.en: Painting something naughty on those snowmen.
translation.fr:
Peindre un truc coquin
sur un bonhomme de neige.

translation.en: Ice-skating.
You're joking.
You know you want to.
In your dreams.
Oh, come on. It'll be fun.
For you.
How do you feel about polar bears?
translation.fr: Tu aimes bien les ours polaires ?

translation.en: No one can ever know about this.
It'll be our little secret.
So, you're really spending Christmas with your cousin?
translation.fr: Tu passes vraiment Noël avec ta cousine ?

translation.en: Well, better with Maggie than with Our Lady of Perpetual Pain.
translation.fr:
Je préfère Maggie
à Notre Dame de la Souffrance Éternelle.

translation.en: Pemmie, it's quite all right to admit you have feelings for other people.
translation.fr:
Tu as le droit d'admettre
que tu as des sentiments pour les autres.

translation.en: You've gone mushy since the last time I saw you.
translation.fr:
Tu es devenu sentimental
depuis notre dernière rencontre.

translation.en: -'Tis the season. -[scoffs]
Speaking of mushy, may I have this dance?
translation.fr:
En parlant de ça,
tu m'accordes cette danse ?

translation.en: You're determined to smother us in holiday cheese, aren't you?
translation.fr:
Tu es vraiment déterminé à nous étouffer
dans la mièvrerie des fêtes ?

translation.en: You catch on quick.
Promise me you'll drive safely.
I promise. I'll be back before you know it.
Pete, old boy, is climbing the roof the only way to get into Hunter's house?
translation.fr:
Pete, escalader le toit est vraiment
le seul moyen d'entrer chez Hunter ?

translation.en: Yes, Reggie.
The trickiest part is getting back down.
translation.fr: Le plus dur, c'est de redescendre.

translation.en: Can't we just take the stairs?
Let's go.
[Amoah] I cannot tell you how impressed His Eminence was
translation.fr:
Sachez que Son Éminence
était impressionnée

translation.en: that you and Princess Stacy have been involved
translation.fr:
que vous et la princesse Stacy
ayez géré

translation.en: in all the details of this wondrous event.
translation.fr:
tous les détails
de ce merveilleux évènement.

translation.en: Most people would let others do the work and take the credit themselves. [laughs]
translation.fr:
La plupart des gens laissent les autres
faire et s'attribuent le mérite.

translation.en: Oh no, Stacy and I are…
are extremely involved.
As a matter of fact, she's in a meeting with the logistics committee right now,
translation.fr:
D'ailleurs, elle est en réunion
avec le comité de la logistique.

translation.en: but if she were here, she'd tell you how deeply moved we are
translation.fr: Si elle était là, elle vous dirait combien nous sommes émues

translation.en: that the Vatican chose to honor our efforts.
translation.fr:
que le Vatican ait choisi
d'honorer nos efforts.

translation.en: Oh, we have not always chosen wisely. Oh no, no, no.
translation.fr:
Nous n'avons pas toujours fait
les bons choix.

translation.en: In fact, in the 16th century,
we loaned the Star of Peace to Harry the Horrible,
translation.fr:
nous avons prêté l'Étoile de la Paix
à Harry l'Affreux,

translation.en: the ruler of Caledonia. It was a great mistake.
translation.fr:
le dirigeant de Caledonia.
C'était une erreur.

translation.en: A band of thieves nearly made away with it.
translation.fr:
Une bande de voleurs
a failli s'enfuir avec.

translation.en: They were tarred and feathered,
translation.fr:
Ils ont été couverts
de plumes et de goudron.

translation.en: but Harry was blamed because it happened on his watch.
translation.fr:
Harry a été puni
car c'est arrivé sous sa garde.

translation.en: -[exhales] -The poor devil was excommunicated.
translation.fr: Le pauvre diable a été excommunié.

translation.en: Are you all right, my dear?
Just overcome with emotion.
translation.fr:
Je suis simplement
submergée par l'émotion.

translation.en: I understand completely.
The moment you light up that tree
not only will the eyes of the world be upon you but also the eyes of God.
translation.fr:
les yeux du monde seront braqués sur vous,
mais également les yeux de Dieu.

translation.en: I never thought of it like that.
translation.fr: Je n'avais pas vu ça comme ça.

translation.en: Might I offer you a slice of yule log, Cardinal?
translation.fr: Puis-je vous offrir une part de bûche ?

translation.en: -I shouldn't. -[exhales]
translation.fr: Je ne devrais pas, mais c'est Noël.

translation.en: -But it is Christmas. [chuckles] -Please help yourself.
translation.fr: Je ne devrais pas, mais c'est Noël. Servez-vous.

translation.en: What in heaven's name was that?
That was the yodeler rehearsing for the ceremony.
translation.fr:
C'était la chanteuse tyrolienne
qui répétait pour la cérémonie.

translation.en: The poor fellow sounded a bit hoarse.
translation.fr: La pauvre est un peu enrouée.

translation.en: Which is why he needs to practice. [laughs]
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'elle doit répéter.

translation.en: The doctor said it's just a sprain.
There is no way you can climb up the side of a building.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas escalader un bâtiment.

translation.en: I could supervise from the van.
-You're not supervising me, mate. -Wh-- [moans]
translation.fr:
- Tu ne me supervises pas.
- Quoi…

translation.en: We still need two people to get around security in the gallery.
translation.fr:
Il nous faut toujours deux personnes
pour contourner la sécurité.

translation.en: Mindy can't do it. She's handling the cameras.
translation.fr:
Mindy ne peut pas.
Elle s'occupe des caméras.

translation.en: Why not let Fifi do it? She had the moves down cold.
translation.fr:
Fifi pourrait ?
Ses gestes étaient parfaits.

translation.en: Fiona will be with Hunter.
I'm afraid we're back to square one. We'll have to come up with something else.
translation.fr:
Retour à la case départ.
On doit trouver autre chose.

translation.en: But there isn't time to come up with something else.
translation.fr: Mais on n'a pas le temps.

translation.en: [scoffs] Pay attention, Betty Crocker. I can't be at two places at once.
translation.fr:
Mme Tout-le-monde. Je ne peux pas
être à deux endroits à la fois.

translation.en: -[Frank] Wait a minute. -Darling.
[Frank] Maybe she could.
[Edward] What was that, Frank?
[Frank] Forgive me for pointing out the obvious,
but if Ms. Pembroke could successfully impersonate Her Majesty,
translation.fr:
mais si Mlle Pembroke a pu
se faire passer pour Sa Majesté,

translation.en: it stands to reason that Her Majesty could impersonate Ms. Pembroke.
translation.fr:
il va de soi que Sa Majesté pourrait
se faire passer pour Mlle Pembroke.

translation.en: -[scoffs] Not in a million years. -[Frank squeaks]
Bite your tongue.
-It's completely out of the question. -[scoffs] Certainly, sir. I…
translation.fr:
- C'est hors de question.
- Bien sûr, monsieur. Je réfléchissais à voix haute.
Quelle idiotie de ma part !

translation.en: I was just thinking out loud. How very stupid of me.
translation.fr:
Je réfléchissais à voix haute.
Quelle idiotie de ma part !

translation.en: That's all right, Frank. We all come up with bad ideas now and again.
translation.fr:
On a tous de mauvaises idées
de temps en temps.

translation.en: -Indeed. -It is an outrageous idea.
translation.fr:
- En effet.
- C'est une idée scandaleuse.

translation.en: But I did switch places with Stacy twice, and no one was the wiser.
translation.fr:
Mais j'ai échangé ma place avec Stacy
deux fois et personne ne l'a su.

translation.en: [chuckling] Trading places with Ms. Pembroke?
translation.fr: Vous faire passer pour Mlle Pembroke ?

translation.en: That's a different matter entirely.
Yeah, but all she'd have to do is keep Hunter busy
while they break into the gallery.
The whole thing should take less than an hour.
translation.fr: Ça devrait prendre moins d'une heure.

translation.en: You can't be serious.
It really isn't that long.
[Fiona] Listen to me.
Hunter Cunard is a dangerous and complicated man.
translation.fr:
Hunter Cunard est un homme dangereux
et compliqué.

translation.en: No, Maggie could never pull it off.
Why not?
Well, not to be unkind, Moo,
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas être méchante,

translation.en: but you certainly don't have the, uh… [inhales] …je ne sais quoi.
translation.fr: mais tu n'as pas ce je-ne-sais-quoi.

translation.en: [mimics Fiona] Minions, fetch me my champagne.
[scoffs] I do not sound like that.
translation.fr: Je ne parle pas comme ça.

translation.en: [mimics Fiona] Hello, royal six-pack.
[laughs] Oh. Well, you sound exactly like that.
-I do not. -You do.
-But I don't. -But you do.
-But I don't. -You really do.
Oh, she's good.
Look, I have to object. It's… it's far too risky.
translation.fr:
Je dois m'y opposer.
C'est bien trop risqué.

translation.en: If it means recovering the Star…
translation.fr: Si ça permet de récupérer l'Étoile…

translation.en: [sighs] …it's a risk I'm willing to take.
translation.fr: je suis prête à prendre ce risque.

translation.en: Indeed.
Well, here we go again.
No, arch your back.
More.
Ugh, never mind.
What you need to do is tap into the video feed,
translation.fr: Tu dois pénétrer dans le système vidéo,

translation.en: record five seconds, switch to playback, and route that through the auxiliary feed.
translation.fr:
faire un enregistrement
et le passer dans le système auxiliaire.

translation.en: -You got it? -Got it.
[Fiona] Ready?
[Margaret] Oh dear.
And one, two, three, four.
One, two, three, four.
One, two, three. You're starting to get the hang of it.
translation.fr:
Un, deux, trois.
Tu commences à piger le truc.

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
[Fiona] Now, swing those hips.
[Margaret] I feel like I am.
[Fiona] Now you've got it. Let them know you're…
translation.fr: Là, c'est bon. Fais-leur savoir que tu…

translation.en: [Fiona] Hunter and I met five years ago.
translation.fr: Je l'ai rencontré il y a cinq ans.

translation.en: He plays tennis and polo, which is a total bore,
translation.fr:
Il joue au tennis et au polo,
ce qui est terriblement ennuyeux,

translation.en: but he can't resist a good martini.
I told him I wanted to sell Pembroke.
translation.fr:
Je lui ai dit
que je voulais vendre Pembroke.

translation.en: -You did? -Hm.
And he's excellent at the tango.
translation.fr: Et il danse très bien le tango.

translation.en: I might need to brush up. [chuckles]
Not to presume, Mr. Maxwell,
but if you are in need of a wheelman, I am more than happy to volunteer.
translation.fr:
si vous avez besoin d'un chauffeur,
je me porte volontaire à 100 %.

translation.en: Now, that's not something you see every day.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas quelque chose
qu'on voit tous les jours.

translation.en: Hang on. The frame is wrong.
translation.fr: Attendez. Le cadre n'est pas bon.

translation.en: May I?
It's like this.
If I could please have everyone's attention.
May I present Fiona Pembroke.
And Fiona Pembroke.
[exhales] Any thoughts?
[hesitates] It's amazing.
And a bit unsettling.
I know exactly how you feel.
-I'll do the hair once you're in the gown. -I'll go change.
translation.fr:
- Je te coifferai quand tu seras en robe.
- Je vais me changer.

translation.en: -I think this might work. [laughs] -[Margaret] Mm.
-All right then. Let's get the van ready. -Right.
I was thinking maybe, when this is over, the two of us could spend some time together.
translation.fr:
Je me disais que, quand ce serait fini,
on pourrait passer du temps ensemble.

translation.en: Oh, Peter, you know I never plan past lunch.
translation.fr:
Tu sais que je ne planifie jamais
plus loin que le déjeuner.

translation.en: Wow. Should have seen that coming.
Seen what coming?
Has it ever occurred to you
that every time you start to feel something for someone, you pull away?
translation.fr:
que chaque fois que tu t'attaches
à quelqu'un, tu t'éloignes ?

translation.en: From me, from your family, from everyone. This isn't the first time it's happened.
translation.fr:
De moi, de ta famille, de tout le monde.
Ce n'est pas la première fois.

translation.en: Oh, please.
Admit it, Pemmie. You didn't leave because you had feelings for Hunter.
translation.fr:
- S'il te plaît.
- Admets-le. Tu n'es pas partie pour Hunter,

translation.en: You left because you had feelings for me, and it scared you.
translation.fr:
mais car tu tenais à moi
et ça t'a effrayée.

translation.en: Is that what you really think?
translation.fr: C'est vraiment ce que tu crois ?

translation.en: What I really think is that you're so hurt by what happened to you when we were kids,
translation.fr:
Tu as tant souffert de ce qui t'est arrivé
quand on était enfants

translation.en: you're terrified of letting anyone in.
translation.fr: que tu as peur de t'attacher.

translation.en: You've always got a plane to catch or somewhere to be, just like your mum.
translation.fr:
Tu as toujours un avion à prendre
ou un endroit où aller, comme ta mère.

translation.en: I'm nothing like her.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas comme elle.

translation.en: -I'm sorry, Fiona. I didn't mean-- -No, you meant every word.
translation.fr:
- Désolé. Je ne le pensais…
- Tu pensais chaque mot.

translation.en: Let's just stick to business from now on, shall we?
Fine.
Business it is.
Van's ready.
[Peter] Brilliant.
It'll take us a while to get to Hunter's estate in this weather.
translation.fr: Le trajet sera long, par ce temps.

translation.en: I'll be back at four.
[Reggie] Should we synchronize our watches?
Be ready to go.
Pete, I can show you how it's done. It's a button and a twisty-twisty.
translation.fr:
Je peux te montrer.
C'est un bouton et un geste.

translation.en: Come on. Permission to synchronize. That's what it is.
Hey, wait up, Pete. Pete!
I call shotgun.
-You can't call shotgun. -[chuckles] Why not?
Could it be because we don't want a cat burglar sitting in the front seat?
translation.fr:
Parce qu'on ne veut pas
d'un cambrioleur assis à l'avant.

translation.en: I'll get in the back.
I'm fine. I'm fine.
[Margaret] Wish me luck. [Stacy] Good luck.
Just keep Hunter entertained, and everything will be fine.
translation.fr:
Contente-toi de divertir Hunter
et tout ira bien.

translation.en: [Margaret] Fingers crossed.
I hope Margaret can carry this off.
Well, she pulled off being me. Remember?
translation.fr: Elle a réussi à être moi. Tu as oublié ?

translation.en: That was different. Hunter Cunard's a criminal.
translation.fr: C'était différent. Hunter Cunard est un criminel.

translation.en: -If something goes wrong-- -Margaret can take care of herself.
translation.fr:
- Si ça tourne mal…
- Margaret peut se débrouiller.

translation.en: I'm so sorry to interrupt, but, uh, I have an urgent call
translation.fr:
Pardon de vous couper, j'ai un appel urgent
de la Mère supérieure de St Michael.

translation.en: from Mother Superior at St. Michael's.
translation.fr:
j'ai un appel urgent
de la Mère supérieure de St Michael.

translation.en: I told her Queen Margaret was otherwise occupied
translation.fr:
Je lui ai dit
que la reine Margaret était occupée

translation.en: and that perhaps you could be of service.
Oh, okay.
Good evening, Mother Superior.
I deeply apologize for imposing, Your Highness,
translation.fr: Pardon de vous importuner, Votre Altesse,

translation.en: but, uh, something important's come up,
and I… I desperately need Queen Margaret's help.
translation.fr:
J'ai désespérément besoin de l'aide
de la reine Margaret.

translation.en: Uh, well, I'm happy to give her the message.
[Mother Superior hesitates] It's a rather delicate matter.
You see, the disciplinary committee
translation.fr: Vous voyez, le comité de discipline

translation.en: was set to review Ms. Pembroke's case after Christmas,
translation.fr:
devait examiner le cas de Mlle Pembroke
après Noël,

translation.en: but, uh, well, I've just received a call, and they've pushed up her review.
translation.fr:
mais je viens de recevoir un appel
et ils ont décalé son audition.

translation.en: The committee will be here at seven o'clock.
translation.fr: Le comité sera là à 19 h.

translation.en: -[gasps] Tonight? -[Mother Superior] Tonight.
Now, I really must insist Ms. Pembroke return on the double.
translation.fr:
Il faut vraiment
que Mlle Pembroke rentre au plus vite.

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, um, I don't know about that.
[Mother Superior] Please!
Your Highness, if it's discovered Ms. Pembroke isn't here,
translation.fr:
Votre Altesse, si on découvre
que Mlle Pembroke n'est pas là,

translation.en: then heads will roll, including mine.
translation.fr: des têtes tomberont, y compris la mienne.

translation.en: The committee, well, they may recommend a jail sentence.
translation.fr:
Le comité pourrait recommander
une peine de prison.

translation.en: And not just for her.
Okay, okay. I'll… I'll see what I can do. Bye.
translation.fr:
Je vais voir ce que je peux faire.
Au revoir.

translation.en: -[Stacey sighs] -What's wrong?
We have to get Fiona back to St. Michael's by seven,
translation.fr:
On doit ramener Fiona à St Michael
pour 19 h

translation.en: or she and Mother Superior are headed to the big house.
translation.fr:
ou elle et la Mère supérieure
risquent la prison.

translation.en: Stacy, Fiona's on her way to Cunard's party.
translation.fr: Fiona se rend à la fête de Cunard.

translation.en: She can't be at the convent as well.
translation.fr: Elle ne peut pas être au couvent.

translation.en: No.
Well, maybe…
No, no, no, no. I know what you're thinking. And no. Absolutely not. It's out of the question.
translation.fr:
Je sais ce que tu penses. Et non.
Non. C'est hors de question.

translation.en: Edward, if Fiona doesn't show up, everything could go south.
translation.fr:
Edward, si Fiona ne s'y rend pas,
tout pourrait mal tourner.

translation.en: The disciplinary committee is going to start asking questions
translation.fr:
Le comité de discipline
va commencer à poser des questions

translation.en: that we don't want to answer.
translation.fr: auxquelles on ne veut pas répondre.

translation.en: Believe me, I don't want to do this either,
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas faire ça non plus,

translation.en: but I don't think we have a choice.
translation.fr: mais on n'a pas le choix.

translation.en: Then I'm going with you.
We're a team. Remember?
translation.fr: On forme une équipe. Tu te souviens ?

translation.en: Go, team. [laughs]
[man] Good evening, ma'am.
How on earth does she walk in these things?
[sighs] Dear me.
[man] Sector one, sector two. You're good.
translation.fr: Secteur un, secteur deux. Tout va bien.

translation.en: -Why are you hunched over like that? -'Cause this is the way it's done.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi tu te baisses ?
- C'est comme ça qu'on fait.

translation.en: -How would you know? -Everyone knows how it's done.
translation.fr:
- Tu en sais quoi ?
- C'est bien connu.

translation.en: Could you speak a little louder so everyone knows we're breaking in?
translation.fr:
Pourriez-vous crier
pour avertir tout le monde ?

translation.en: -Nice going. -Shh.
-You shush! -Shh.
What do you think?
Absolutely terrifying.
Let's go.
Okay.
[man 1] There you are, miss.
[man 2] Fiona. Fiona Pembroke?
Don't you remember your old pal, Simon?
translation.fr: Tu te souviens de ton ami Simon ?

translation.en: From Aldovia?
Meow. [chuckles]
-I'm so glad that you could make it. -Oh, how could I resist one of these?
translation.fr: Je suis heureux que tu aies pu venir. Comment résister à ces cocktails ?

translation.en: Would you, uh, like to see my Christmas tree?
translation.fr: Tu aimerais voir mon sapin de Noël ?

translation.en: I would love to see your tree. [chuckles]
The Star of Peace.
Right where you said it would be.
Let's go.
-[sighs] Okay. -[Reggie] Santa to Rudolph. Come in, Rudolph. Rudolph, do you read me?
translation.fr:
Père Noël à Rudolph. Réponds, Rudolph.
Tu me reçois ?

translation.en: I already told you I'm not using those code names.
translation.fr: Je refuse d'utiliser ces noms de code.

translation.en: -Why not? -Because they're stupid.
-Now would you let me concentrate? -[Reggie] Ooh!
Well, there's no need to take that tone.
What's new?
Not a bloody thing.
So, you never did tell me if you're still in touch with that Peter Maxwell.
translation.fr:
Tu ne m'as jamais dit si tu étais toujours
en contact avec ce Peter Maxwell.

translation.en: I haven't spoken to that repellent little toad in years.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai pas parlé à ce petit crapaud
repoussant depuis des années.

translation.en: Don't we have some business to discuss?
Oh, yes. The, uh, purchase of your estate.
But, uh, I'm a firm believer in pleasure before business.
translation.fr:
Mais, pour moi,
le plaisir passe avant les affaires.

translation.en: You nasty boy.
Wait here.
Oh dear lord!
-The keypad was supposed to be here. -[sighs]
translation.fr: Le clavier était censé être là.

translation.en: Check over there.
[Hunter] What do you mean, out of vintage champagne?
translation.fr: Comment ça ? Plus de champagne millésimé ?

translation.en: Put it back.
-I don't know what happened. -It's your job to know what happened.
translation.fr:
- Je ne comprends pas.
- C'est pourtant votre travail.

translation.en: [woman] Well, I just--
God, all you do is make excuses. I want you gone. Tonight.
translation.fr:
Cessez de vous chercher des excuses.
Vous êtes virée. Sur-le-champ.

translation.en: But, sir, it's Christmas.
[mocking] "Sir, it's Christmas."
Get out of my sight.
-Now. -[glasses clink]
-[sighs] -That was uncomfortably close.
Oh. On the bright side,
found the keypad.
How on earth does she walk in these things? No idea.
translation.fr:
- Comment peut-elle marcher avec ça ?
- Aucune idée.

translation.en: -Are you okay? -[Edward] Well, more or less.
Never done anything like this before.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais fait ce genre de choses.

translation.en: [exhales] Yeah, um, just try and be chill.
Right, yes. Chilling.
[Mother Superior] Okay. Come!
Ms. Pembroke. [chuckles nervously] There you are.
You're very late.
Correction, official man. I'm fashionably late.
translation.fr:
Rectification, fonctionnaire.
Je suis en retard comme il se doit.

translation.en: Take a seat.
-[Edward] Ladies and gentlemen-- -Aren't you--
Prince Edward of Belgravia.
Ms. Pembroke kidnapped my wife,
translation.fr: Mlle Pembroke a kidnappé ma femme.

translation.en: and I thought, if anybody should be a character witness on her behalf,
translation.fr:
J'ai pensé que si quelqu'un devait être
son témoin de moralité,

translation.en: well, it would be me.
But you just said she kidnapped your wife.
translation.fr:
Vous venez de dire
qu'elle a kidnappé votre femme.

translation.en: Yes, I did.
And she did, but since then, she has reformed.
translation.fr:
Elle l'a fait,
mais depuis, elle s'est repentie.

translation.en: You see, underneath all of, uh… uh, that,
Ms. Pembroke really has a good heart.
translation.fr: Mlle Pembroke a vraiment bon cœur.

translation.en: And yes, she has made some mistakes,
translation.fr: Et oui, elle a fait des erreurs,

translation.en: but isn't our ability to forgive a measure of our own humanity?
translation.fr:
mais la capacité à pardonner
ne témoigne-t-elle pas de notre humanité ?

translation.en: Especially at Christmas.
Is there anything you'd like to add?
Everything His Royal Hotness says is true.
translation.fr: Tout ce que dit ce canon royal est vrai.

translation.en: I've made some hideous mistakes.
In fact, if you need to extend my sentence,
translation.fr:
En fait,
si vous souhaitez prolonger ma peine,

translation.en: I completely understand.
Actually, I recommend it.
-[Edward] She doesn't mean that. -Oh, but I do.
translation.fr:
- Elle ne le pense pas.
- Mais si.

translation.en: -No, you don't. -I do.
-No, you don't. -I do.
-No, you don't. -I think we've heard enough.
translation.fr:
- Non.
- Si. Nous en avons assez entendu.
Je vais m'entretenir avec mes collègues.

translation.en: I'd like to confer with my colleagues for a moment.
translation.fr:
Nous en avons assez entendu.
Je vais m'entretenir avec mes collègues.

translation.en: -Of course. -Take all the time you need.
translation.fr:
- Bien sûr.
- Prenez tout votre temps.

translation.en: [Peter] Damn it, it's not connecting.
Try my birthday. December 14th.
You and Hunter haven't been together for more than five years.
translation.fr:
Ça fait plus de cinq ans
que vous vous êtes séparés.

translation.en: He's not going to remember your birthday.
[scoffs] Trust me. I made an impression.
translation.fr:
Crois-moi.
Je lui ai fait une forte impression.

translation.en: Fine.
[sighs] Here he comes.
Well, that took forever.
Oh, trust me. It's worth the wait.
translation.fr: Fais-moi confiance. Ça en vaut la peine.

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
Doesn't the duchess of Marlborough have this same bracelet?
translation.fr:
La duchesse de Marlborough
n'a pas le même bracelet ?

translation.en: And matching earrings?
You know, I think I left those earrings upstairs.
translation.fr:
J'ai laissé ces boucles d'oreilles
en haut.

translation.en: Shall we go and fetch them?
But they're playing a tango.
You always loved a good tango.
translation.fr: Tu as toujours aimé le tango.

translation.en: Then let's dance.
Are you ready to go upstairs and find those earrings?
translation.fr:
Tu es prête à monter
chercher ces boucles d'oreilles ?

translation.en: [pants] So hot. I need water.
We've reached a decision regarding Ms. Pembroke.
The fact that she was late for this meeting
indicates a troubling disregard for authority.
translation.fr:
indique un mépris troublant
pour l'autorité.

translation.en: Added to her past transgressions,
translation.fr: Compte tenu de ses transgressions passées,

translation.en: it would appear that increasing her sentence is warranted.
translation.fr:
il semblerait que l'allongement
de sa peine soit justifié.

translation.en: If I may be allowed to say, uh, just one more point about my wi… Ms. Pembroke--
translation.fr:
Si je puis me permettre d'ajouter
un point au sujet de ma… Mlle Pembroke…

translation.en: If you'll allow me to finish please, Your Highness, sir,
I said it was warranted,
but I don't believe it's the right thing to do.
translation.fr: mais je crois que c'est le mauvais choix.

translation.en: Ms. Pembroke,
the committee is very impressed with your sincere remorse.
translation.fr:
le comité est impressionné
par vos remords sincères.

translation.en: You truly aren't the person we met with before.
translation.fr:
Vous n'êtes vraiment plus
la même personne.

translation.en: I truly am not.
Based on the testimony of your character witness
translation.fr:
Sur la base du témoignage
de votre témoin de moralité

translation.en: as well as the recommendations of Mother Superior,
translation.fr:
et sur les recommandations
de la Mère supérieure,

translation.en: we hereby commute the remainder of your sentence.
translation.fr: nous annulons le reste de votre peine.

translation.en: It's a Christmas miracle!
[hesitates] Of course we will miss you terribly.
translation.fr:
Bien sûr,
vous nous manquerez terriblement.

translation.en: Oh, of course you will.
Well, we best be going.
-[chuckles] -Yes.
Thank you very much, and of course, Merry Christmas.
translation.fr: Merci beaucoup et, bien sûr, joyeux Noël.

translation.en: I'm not sure how I feel about getting Fiona off the hook.
translation.fr:
Je ne suis pas sûre
que ça me plaise d'aider Fiona.

translation.en: -Let's not worry about that right now. -[scoffs]
translation.fr: Ne nous en inquiétons pas maintenant.

translation.en: You know, it's deliciously exhilarating engaging in all this skulduggery.
translation.fr:
C'est délicieusement grisant
de se livrer à toutes ces fourberies.

translation.en: -[laughs] Come on. -Ah.
That wasn't supposed to happen.
Hey. What's that?
It's a sensor in the gallery.
Something's happening. I think it's an alarm.
translation.fr:
Il se passe quelque chose.
Une alarme apparemment.

translation.en: -Well, sort it out then! -I don't know what to do!
-Use the laptop! Turn it off and on again. -I don't think that's gonna work!
translation.fr:
- Éteins et rallume l'ordinateur.
- Ça ne marchera pas !

translation.en: [Reggie] Google it!
Take this.
Hold on. It stopped.
For now, but the jig is up. You got to get out of there.
translation.fr:
Pour l'instant,
mais la fête est finie. Sors de là.

translation.en: -Maybe the music's vibration set it off. -Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Peut-être les vibrations de la musique.
- Oui.

translation.en: Psst! Frank! Mayday, Frank. Mayday! Abort the mission.
translation.fr: Frank ! SOS, Frank. SOS ! Annulez la mission.

translation.en: -What? -Get in the van!
What about Fiona and Peter?
Me and Frankie boy, we're getting out while the getting's good.
translation.fr:
Nous, on se tire
tant qu'on le peut encore.

translation.en: I ain't ending up six foot under.
Okay, I'm coming.
Oh God.
Let's go.
Stay here.
Oh. But… but… I've… I've cooled off now.
-I'll only be a minute. -[exhales]
-I'll be back as fast as I can. -[gasps]
[exhales] Don't panic. Keep calm and carry on.
translation.fr:
Ne panique pas.
Reste calme et donne le change.

translation.en: [exhales] And run.
-[man 1] Check on that room! -They're coming. Take it.
What about you?
Just take it. Go. I'll distract them.
translation.fr: Prends-la. Fonce. Je vais les distraire.

translation.en: [man 2] Hey! Over here!
[man 3 on comm] He's heading to the east stairway.
translation.fr: Il se dirige vers l'escalier est.

translation.en: Alpha team to the east exit.
translation.fr: Équipe Alpha à la sortie est.

translation.en: [inhales] Almost there.
[man 4] Your cape, Your Majesty.
[chuckles] Thank you.
All right! Let's get the hell out of here!
Move it, Frank!
But Ms. Pembroke is not here!
It's everyone for themselves! Come on!
-[man yells indistinctly] -[Reggie whimpers]
Oh dear.
Over here. Over… Stop! Come back here at once!
translation.fr: Par ici. Arrêtez ! Revenez tout de suite !

translation.en: Frank!
[laughs] That feels much better.
[screams] You're all fired! Do you hear me?
No more free vacays and booze!
translation.fr:
Plus de vacances
et de cocktails gratuits.

translation.en: -Oh! What are you doing? -[Mindy groans]
Thank God.
[Frank screams] Fear not, Ms. Pembroke!
-I will save you. -[man] Don't let them get away!
Ms. Pembroke, come with me if you want to live.
translation.fr:
Mlle Pembroke,
venez avec moi si vous voulez vivre.

translation.en: [scoffs] Go!
-Right there! Right there! -Get it!
-I'll call the police. -No.
No police, idiot.
And shut off that alarm.
There you are. -We were so worried about you. -Zsst.
translation.fr: Vous voilà. On s'inquiétait pour vous.

translation.en: Explain.
Well, Mother Superior called,
and your disciplinary meeting got pushed up,
translation.fr: Ta réunion disciplinaire a été décalée.

translation.en: so I had to be you.
But never mind me. Are you guys okay?
translation.fr: Mais peu importe, vous allez bien ?

translation.en: Well, more or less. There was a bit of a hitch.
translation.fr:
Plus ou moins.
Il y a eu un petit problème.

translation.en: Peter had to stay behind to create a diversion.
translation.fr: Peter a dû rester pour faire diversion.

translation.en: But he was able to escape?
Well, we still haven't heard from him, so we don't know.
translation.fr:
On n'a toujours pas de nouvelles,
donc on ne sait pas.

translation.en: Well, did you get the Star?
Of course we did, royal worrywart.
[Margaret] Uh, Fiona.
What is it?
He switched it.
Which means Peter has the Star.
translation.fr: Ce qui veut dire que Peter a l'Étoile.

translation.en: He fooled every one of us into thinking we could trust him.
translation.fr:
Il nous a fait croire
qu'on pouvait lui faire confiance.

translation.en: After everything we went through? I can't believe it.
translation.fr:
Après tout ce qu'on a traversé ?
Je n'arrive pas à y croire.

translation.en: [Margaret] Fiona.
Fiona, you can't feel bad about this.
Yeah, it really isn't your fault.
Well, then whose fault is it?
translation.fr: Alors, c'est la faute de qui ?
