translation.en: -We're back! Merry Chri-- -We're back!
translation.fr:
- On est là ! Joyeux…
- On est là !

translation.en: What the… Who the…
-Huh? -What's going on?
I can explain everything.
Which one are you?
It's okay, Kev. That's Margaret, not Fiona.
translation.fr:
C'est bon, Kevin.
C'est Margaret, pas Fiona.

translation.en: -Stacy? -Yeah.
-And that's Margaret? -Mm-hmm.
-Are you sure? -Let me prove it to you.
translation.fr:
- Tu es sûre ?
- Laisse-moi te le prouver.

translation.en: -No, no, no. -[Margaret] Shh.
[exhales] Okay. It's you.
-Mm. -Phew. That was really strange.
I guess we should call a press conference and let everyone know what's happened.
translation.fr:
Organisons une conférence de presse
pour annoncer ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: [Edward] I can see the headline now.
translation.fr: J'imagine les gros titres. RDV À MANDERSTON

translation.en: "Saint Nicholas's Star of Peace gone forever."
translation.fr: RDV À MANDERSTON "L'Étoile de la Paix disparue à jamais."

translation.en: I suppose we should cancel everything.
The tree lighting, all of it.
Well, first, let's start by informing Inspector Moretti and the cardinal.
translation.fr:
Informons d'abord
le lieutenant Moretti et le cardinal.

translation.en: They deserve to be prepared before all hell breaks loose.
translation.fr:
Ils méritent d'être préparés
à vivre ce cauchemar.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Oh, um, you should know the disciplinary committee waived the rest of your sentence.
translation.fr: Le comité a annulé le reste de ta peine.

translation.en: -What was that? -[Stacy] No more community service.
translation.fr:
- Quoi ?
- Plus de peine à purger.

translation.en: You're done.
[Reggie] You hear that, Fifi?
You're as free as a bird.
Even so, we're hoping you'll stay and spend the holidays with us.
translation.fr:
Malgré tout, on espère
que tu passeras les fêtes avec nous.

translation.en: There's a noon flight to Capri tomorrow.
translation.fr: Il y a un vol pour Capri demain.

translation.en: We can make it if we leave after breakfast.
[scoffs] Capri it is.
-Hello, dear. -Hello. [chuckles]
Mummy, Mummy, Mummy!
[Mindy] Manderston Academy? What we doing here?
translation.fr:
Le pensionnat de Manderston ?
Que fait-on ici ?

translation.en: -[Reggie] Looks like a school to me. -[Mindy] Brilliant deduction, Sherlock.
translation.fr: On dirait une école. Excellente déduction, Sherlock.

translation.en: [boy] Merry Christmas!
I hated school. Skipped most of it.
translation.fr: Je détestais l'école. Je séchais souvent.

translation.en: That explains a lot.
Hey, Fifi, where you going?
-Stop talking. -[girl] Emily, I'm gonna miss you so much!
translation.fr:
Boucle-la. - Tu vas trop me manquer.
- Toi aussi.

translation.en: -Me too. Happy Holidays! -[girl] Bye! Have a great Christmas!
translation.fr:
- Tu vas trop me manquer.
- Toi aussi. - Bonnes vacances.
- Au revoir. Joyeux Noël !

translation.en: Where's the Star, Peter?
I needed to get your attention.
[scoffs] I want the Star.
And you'll get it.
But in exchange, I need you to pop around to the dining hall.
translation.fr:
Mais, en échange, j'ai besoin
que tu fasses un tour au réfectoire.

translation.en: What on earth for?
She wants to talk to you.
How dare you tell me what to do?
translation.fr: Qui es-tu pour me dire quoi faire ?

translation.en: Someone has to, or you'll just go on living an empty, hollow life.
translation.fr:
Quelqu'un doit le faire ou tu vas continuer à vivre
une vie vide et morne.

translation.en: [scoffs] So that's why you double-crossed me,
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que tu m'as trahie ?

translation.en: to let me know I'm destined to be lonely and miserable?
translation.fr:
Pour me dire
que je suis vouée à être seule ?

translation.en: More or less.
Do you want to give me what I came here for?
translation.fr: Donne-moi ce que je suis venue chercher.

translation.en: Or shall I call the police and have you arrested?
translation.fr:
Ou dois-je appeler la police
et te faire arrêter ?

translation.en: I know I said I'd always be there for you, Pemmie,
translation.fr:
J'ai dit
que je serais toujours là pour toi,

translation.en: but this is the end of the line for us.
translation.fr: mais c'est la fin de notre histoire.

translation.en: That's a relief.
Hello, Mummy.
I didn't think you'd come.
I wasn't going to,
but Peter said you wanted to speak to me, so go ahead.
translation.fr:
mais Peter a dit
que tu voulais me parler, alors vas-y.

translation.en: Speak.
The apple doesn't fall far from the tree, does it?
translation.fr:
La pomme ne tombe pas loin de l'arbre,
n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: Is that what you've waited all these years to tell me?
translation.fr:
Tu as attendu toutes ces années
pour me dire ça ?

translation.en: Fiona darling, we can't go on like this.
translation.fr:
Fiona chérie,
on ne peut pas continuer comme ça.

translation.en: Oh, I don't see why not.
You know, I've spent the last few years traveling the world
translation.fr:
J'ai passé ces dernières années
à parcourir le monde

translation.en: trying to find some inner peace.
translation.fr:
pour essayer
de trouver la paix intérieure.

translation.en: Eat, Pray, Love. It's so last decade.
translation.fr:
Mange, prie, aime.
C'est tellement ringard.

translation.en: [Bianca] That may be.
But it was on a retreat at an ashram in Rishikesh
translation.fr:
Mais lors d'une retraite
dans un ashram à Rishikesh

translation.en: that I finally realized that there has been a void in my life.
translation.fr:
j'ai réalisé
qu'il y avait un vide dans ma vie.

translation.en: Something missing.
And it's my daughter.
Fiona. Fiona…
I love you more than anything or anyone.
translation.fr:
je t'aime plus que tout,
plus que quiconque.

translation.en: I always have.
Do you have any idea what it was like
trying to be good enough to be noticed by you?
translation.fr:
que d'essayer d'être assez bien
pour que tu me remarques,

translation.en: Trying to be good enough to matter to you?
Better than you think.
Oh no, that is a lie.
You always had somewhere else you had to be.
You always had a plane to catch.
translation.fr: Tu avais toujours un avion à prendre.

translation.en: I was running away.
-[scoffs] -No, not from you.
Never from you.
Your father was…
Your father was cruel to me,
translation.fr: Ton père était cruel avec moi

translation.en: and rather than suffer it,
translation.fr: et, plutôt que de le subir,

translation.en: I did whatever I could to get as far away from him as possible.
translation.fr:
j'ai fait mon possible
pour m'éloigner de lui.

translation.en: Oh, so you're here to make excuses.
translation.fr: Tu es là pour te trouver des excuses.

translation.en: No, there's… there's no excuse for what I did.
translation.fr:
Il n'y a aucune excuse
pour ce que j'ai fait.

translation.en: You're damned right there isn't.
translation.fr: Tu as bien raison sur ce point.

translation.en: I've carried this around for years.
translation.fr: J'ai gardé ça toutes ces années.

translation.en: Do you remember?
You gave it to me when you were ten. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Tu me l'as donnée quand tu avais dix ans.

translation.en: When I was here, I used to steal little trinkets,
translation.fr:
Quand j'étais ici,
je volais des petites babioles,

translation.en: wrap them up so that on Christmas,
translation.fr: je les emballais et à Noël,

translation.en: I could open them and pretend they were from you.
translation.fr:
je les ouvrais
et j'imaginais que ça venait de toi.

translation.en: I loved you so much, and I tried.
translation.fr: Je t'aimais tellement et j'ai essayé.

translation.en: I tried so hard not to care that I wasn't worthy of being loved back.
translation.fr:
J'ai essayé si fort d'ignorer que je n'étais pas digne
d'être aimée en retour.

translation.en: Oh, Fiona, you wonderful, perfect little girl. I…
I was a wretched mother,
and even though I don't deserve it,
translation.fr: et même si je ne le mérite pas,

translation.en: I'm… I'm hoping that you can find it in your heart to forgive me.
translation.fr:
j'espère que tu trouveras dans ton cœur
la force de me pardonner.

translation.en: Please, darling. Just give me a second chance.
translation.fr:
S'il te plaît, chérie.
Donne-moi une seconde chance.

translation.en: Well, who knows how many Christmases we have left, you and I?
translation.fr:
Qui sait combien de Noël
il nous reste, toi et moi ?

translation.en: It's too late.
[sobs] Fiona.
♪ You've been on my mind ♪ ♪ On my mind ♪
translation.fr:
JOYEUX NOËL, MAMAN
DE LA PART DE FIONA

translation.en: Hey! Come on, Fifi!
We've got a plane to catch.
translation.fr: On a un avion à prendre.

translation.en: Fifi.
-What? -[Reggie] Where you going? Come back!
Come back! We've got a flight to catch!
translation.fr: On a un vol à prendre !

translation.en: -[Reggie] What you doing? We've got to go! -Come back! We can't drive this!
translation.fr:
- Que fais-tu ?
- Reviens. C'est toi qui conduis.

translation.en: [Bianca] Oh, darling.
Shh, shh. It's okay. It's okay. -♪ Home is where the love is ♪ -It's okay. [chuckles]
Hey, everything is gonna be okay. I promise.
translation.fr: Tout ira bien. Je te le promets.

translation.en: Right this way, please.
Cardinal Amoah, Inspector Moretti,
so good of you to come on such short notice.
Your message said it was urgent.
translation.fr: Votre message disait que c'était urgent.

translation.en: [exhales] I'm feeling a little bit queasy.
Please take a seat.
I do hope everything is all right.
-Um-- -It isn't all right. -[sighs] -It's fabulous, darling.
translation.fr:
C'est mieux encore.
C'est fabuleux, ma chérie.

translation.en: We gave the old thing a bit of a polish.
I do hope you don't mind, Your Eminence.
translation.fr:
Vous ne nous en voulez pas,
Votre Éminence ?

translation.en: Mind? It looks spectacular. Gratias ago Deo.
translation.fr:
Vous en vouloir ? Elle est majestueuse.
Gratias ago Deo.

translation.en: Hm? Botticelli, Versace.
Aw, Auntie Bianca, what a pleasure to see you again.
translation.fr: Tante Bianca, quel plaisir de te revoir !

translation.en: -Pleasure to be seen. -[chuckles] [chuckling] And who do we have here?
translation.fr: Ravie d'être ici. Et qui avons-nous là ?

translation.en: Mummy, please.
So, will the two of you be staying with us for Christmas?
translation.fr:
Alors, vous resterez toutes les deux
avec nous pour Noël ?

translation.en: [exhales] Well, if it's all right with Maggie Moo.
All right?
[scoffs] We'd be delighted to have you. You're family.
translation.fr:
Nous serions ravis de vous recevoir.
Vous êtes de la famille.

translation.en: I suppose we are.
[Stacy] Um, Fiona?
I know you and I don't have that much in common,
translation.fr: Toi et moi, on a peu de choses en commun,

translation.en: really anything in common.
I just want to say I'm really grateful for all you've done.
translation.fr:
Je voulais te remercier sincèrement
pour tout ce que tu as fait.

translation.en: -You could have just disappeared. -Oh, I've actually given up disappearing.
translation.fr: Tu aurais pu disparaître. J'ai décidé d'arrêter de disparaître.

translation.en: Glad to hear it.
By the way, how did you convince Peter to give you back the Star?
translation.fr:
Comment as-tu convaincu Peter
de te rendre l'Étoile ?

translation.en: Oh yeah.
He intended to, all along.
translation.fr: Il comptait le faire depuis le début.

translation.en: So does that mean he'll be joining us for Christmas?
translation.fr:
Ça veut dire qu'il se joindra à nous
pour Noël ?

translation.en: Peter and I decided to go our separate ways.
translation.fr:
Nous avons décidé
de prendre nos distances.

translation.en: [Stacy] Oh no.
I'm so sorry.
Don't be. It's for the best.
I think you need a hug.
Please, no.
No… There it is.
Hey, my family is from the Philippines. We do hugs.
translation.fr:
Ma famille vient des Philippines.
On fait des câlins.

translation.en: ♪ Up on the housetop, the reindeer pause ♪
translation.fr: Sur le toit, les rennes font une pause

translation.en: ♪ Out jumps good ol' Santa Claus ♪
translation.fr: Le bon vieux père Noël sort d'un bond

translation.en: ♪ Down through the chimney With lots of toys ♪
translation.fr: Passe par la cheminée avec plein de jouets

translation.en: ♪ All for the little ones Christmas joys ♪
translation.fr: Pour les petits, les joies de Noël

translation.en: -♪ Ho, ho, ho! Who wouldn't go? ♪ -[woman yodels]
translation.fr: Ho, ho, ho ! Qui n'irait pas ?

translation.en: ♪ Ho, ho, ho! Who wouldn't go? ♪
translation.fr: Ho, ho, ho ! Qui n'irait pas ?

translation.en: ♪ Up on the housetop Click, click, click ♪
translation.fr: Sur le toit, clic, clic, clic

translation.en: ♪ Down through the chimney With good Saint Nick ♪
translation.fr: Par la cheminée avec le bon saint Nicolas

translation.en: After all we went through, it's a miracle this came together.
translation.fr: Après tout ce qu'on a vécu, ceci est un miracle.

translation.en: Ah, I knew it would.
You didn't tell me what happened to Hunter Cunard.
Oh, the police arrested him last night trying to flee the country.
translation.fr:
La police l'a arrêté
alors qu'il tentait de fuir le pays.

translation.en: Guessing he's gonna spend a long time in jail.
translation.fr: Il va passer un moment en prison.

translation.en: Well, deservedly so.
I gave them the diamond bracelet as well.
translation.fr: J'ai rendu le bracelet en diamants.

translation.en: Did you happen to keep those red heels?
translation.fr: Tu as gardé ces talons rouges ?

translation.en: Kevin!
I couldn't be more proud of you and Queen Margaret, of course,
translation.fr:
Je suis très fier de toi
et de la reine Margaret, bien sûr,

translation.en: for putting together a beautiful event like this.
translation.fr: pour avoir organisé un si bel événement.

translation.en: Well, I couldn't have done it without you.
translation.fr: Je n'aurais pas pu le faire sans toi.

translation.en: Well, I dare say we make a great team.
translation.fr: J'ose dire qu'on forme une super équipe.

translation.en: Just like that dashing chap who dresses up like a bat
translation.fr:
Comme ce fringant héros
déguisé en chauve-souris

translation.en: and his, uh, beautiful catlike companion.
[laughs] Babe, Batman and Catwoman aren't a team.
translation.fr:
Bébé, Batman et Catwoman
ne font pas équipe.

translation.en: Of course they are.
I love you.
[chuckles] Cheers, darling.
You know, this is the best Christmas I have ever had.
translation.fr: C'est le plus beau Noël de toute ma vie !

translation.en: Oh, because someone spiked the eggnog?
translation.fr:
Car le lait de poule
a été alcoolisé en douce ?

translation.en: No, it's because I have my beautiful daughter back.
translation.fr:
Non, parce que j'ai retrouvé
ma magnifique fille.

translation.en: So, is this how it's going to be between us?
translation.fr: Ça va donc se passer comme ça entre nous ?

translation.en: All gooey and sentimental?
Mm-hmm. Oh yeah. Come here.
Merry Christmas, darling.
Merry Christmas, Mummy.
Love you.
Guru Adishankar, it's so lovely to see you.
translation.fr:
Guru Adishankar,
c'est un plaisir de vous voir.

translation.en: [laughing] I'm so happy!
-I'm so glad we're together. -Oh my!
translation.fr:
- C'est un vrai bonheur.
- Bon sang !

translation.en: -Look at this guy! -[laughs]
You! You look bangin', bro.
[Mindy] Well, hello, Mr. Handsome.
[Peter] Talk about clichés.
Beautiful woman, alone on Christmas, gazing up at the night sky.
translation.fr:
Une belle femme,
seule à Noël, regardant le ciel étoilé.

translation.en: Hm. I expected better from you.
I didn't think I'd see you again.
translation.fr: Je ne pensais pas te revoir.

translation.en: I was mad at you, Pemmie,
because you didn't care about me as much as I cared about you.
translation.fr:
parce que tu ne te souciais pas de moi
autant que moi de toi.

translation.en: And that's not a good reason to be mad at someone, so…
translation.fr:
Et ce n'est pas une bonne raison
pour être fâché, alors…

translation.en: so I came back to apologize.
It's my turn to apologize.
translation.fr: C'est à mon tour de m'excuser.

translation.en: You were right.
I do shut people out. It's always felt safer that way.
translation.fr:
Je repousse les gens.
Ça m'a toujours paru plus sûr.

translation.en: But now?
It's what Mummy said.
We never know how much time we have left with the people we care about.
translation.fr:
On ne sait jamais combien de temps
il nous reste avec les gens qu'on aime.

translation.en: [sighs] And we can't waste it.
translation.fr: Et on ne peut pas le gâcher.

translation.en: Promise me you and I won't waste any more time.
translation.fr: Promets-moi qu'on ne perdra plus de temps.

translation.en: I promise.
Swear.
No matter what.
No matter where.
Ladies and gentlemen,
before we light our tree,
we just wanted to say how happy and grateful we are
translation.fr:
nous voulions dire à quel point
nous sommes heureux et reconnaissants

translation.en: that you all are here tonight.
And our greatest hope is that the Christmas spirit of goodwill and love
translation.fr:
Et nous espérons sincèrement
que l'esprit et l'amour de Noël

translation.en: fill the world and shine as brightly as the Star of Peace.
translation.fr:
rempliront le monde et brilleront
aussi fort que l'Étoile de la Paix.

translation.en: So without further ado, Princess Olivia, will you do the honors?
translation.fr:
Alors, sans plus tarder, princesse Olivia,
vous ferez nous l'honneur ?

translation.en: ♪ Deck the halls with boughs of holly ♪
translation.fr: Décorez la salle avec des branches de houx

translation.en: ♪ 'Tis the season to be jolly ♪
translation.fr: C'est la saison pour être joyeux

translation.en: ♪ Don we now our gay apparel ♪
translation.fr: Revêtons maintenant nos habits de couleur

translation.en: Oh my God! Phew!
